Name: Asteroid Turret Defender VR
About the game: A player starts in a confined small base, chained, and an asteroid assault is coming. This game includes several awesome features such as heat up gatling guns with shell casing ejection, rocket launchers with homing missiles, and slow motion to help fight off the assault. A local opponent player can use a PC controller to designate the destination of where asteroids come from and/or launch the mother-ship boss fight. This game is solely made by one person and made with attention to detail.
